title.value: Факторы и механизмы устойчивого экономического развития сельского хозяйства
Factors and mechanisms of stable economic development of agriculture

journal.title: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of Belarus. Agrarian Series

person.name: Gusakov, V.G., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). Presidium

abstract.value: Sustainable development of agriculture of the Republic of Belarus depends on many factors, determining production and realization volumes, income sizes and profitability levels. Profit appears one of the most important criteria of any commercial business, aside from property form and production sphere. Therefore, profit appears the most essential source of sustainable economic development of any branch of national economy, including agro-industrial complex. The article presents the complete economic analysis of the situation of profit-earning in the agro-industrial complex of Belarusian economy and offers the suggestions of radical improvement of the national agro-industrial complex. The basic factors and mechanisms, influencing the process of the development of agro-industry  include intensification and concentration of production, specialization and location, cooperation and integration, investments in the production development, government control, entrepreneurship and personnel, labor motivation, labor productivity, quality of products, use of norms and regulations in production.
